caseTitle: Taufiq Asif v. General (Retd.) Pervez Musharraf & others
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline:
(1) Territorial jurisdiction of the Lahore High Court.

(2) Availability of an alternate adequate remedy.

(3) Decision by High Court on merits of the case.

(4) High Court granted the relief not sought.

(5) Constitutionality of Section 9 of the Special Court Act

(6) Misapplying Mustafa Impex.

(7) Violation of the directions and judgments of this Court.
